body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ 𝕌 →(card ` c0)[≅]c0)
⊣ (c0 ∈ dom(card)↔ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
⊣ (c0 ∈ dom(card)→(card ` c0)[≅]c0)

comment: Any set is equinumerous to its cardinal number. Closed theorem form of ~ cardid . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
